Draft Rating:

F

M.L. Carr ranks in the 18th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Carr's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 9 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Steve Hamer with 38th pick but was worth 21th pick.
  • Drafted Junior Burrough with 33th pick but was worth 23th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Antoine Walker with 6th pick but was worth 10th pick.
  • Drafted Eric Montross with 9th pick but was worth 44th pick.
  • Drafted Eric Williams with 14th pick but was worth 48th pick.

This executive has only made 4 trades and thus doesn't have a trade grade.

Their biggest L:
